subtitleTeacher: Manage the subjects you teach and assign students
createFirst: Create your first subject to start managing students and content.
notTeaching: You are not currently teaching this subject
noAssignedStudents: No students assigned to this subject
assignedByTeachers: Will be assigned by the teacher
deleteSubjectQuestion: Are you sure you want to delete the subject "{subject}"? This action will also remove all student enrollments.
joinSubjectQuestion: Are you sure you want to start teaching the subject "{subject}"?
joinSubjectComplete: You are now teaching the subject "{subject}"!
joinSubjectError: Error starting to teach the subject: {message}
studentAssigned: Student {name} {surnames} has been assigned to the subject
removeStudentQuestion: Are you sure you want to remove {name} {surnames} from this subject?
studentRemoved: Student {name} {surnames} has been removed from the subject
